alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New London; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 7:19PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of New London and Northern Middlesex Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 719 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near East Haddam to New London. Movement was north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Norwich, New London, Colchester, East Hampton, Groton, Salem, Chester, Waterford, East Lyme, Ledyard, Griswold, East Haddam, Haddam, Old Lyme and Lebanon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Middlesex; Northern New London; Southern New London
